participant_1.name: James
participant_1.background: I've started my own finance blog, and it's been a lot of fun! My biggest challenge was when I was in the military and had to be away from my family for long periods of time. I own a black suburban. My favorite coffee is french vanilla. My friends would be so impressed by my cupcake recipe.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.background: I want to learn how to knit sweaters to keep me warm in the winter. My family works to support my dreams. I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal. I'm the youngest of five. I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.

content.text: I'm passionate about knitting sweaters to keep me warm in the winter!
That's awesome! I'm not so good at crafts, but I love to read, write, and cook.
I love to write too! I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.
That's great! I have a blog where I write about my finance experiences, and I'm really enjoying it.
That's awesome! My family works hard to support my dreams, so I love to do things that make them proud.
That's so great! My family is really supportive too. I'm the youngest of five kids, so I'm always looking for ways to make them laugh.
Haha! I bet you're really funny then!
I think so! I love making people laugh.
That's awesome! I love to laugh too.
I used to ride my motorcycle a lot, but I had to sell it to pay for my car.
That's too bad! I love riding my bike too.
I miss it! But I'm really happy with my car.
That's great! I'm glad you're happy with it.
